Ryu Jisu

Korean: 류지수

Hometown:

Seoul

Country:

South Korea

Birthday:
Mar 25, 1994
Age:
31 years old

Introduction

Jisu Ryu (류지수) is a South Korean indie singer. With her soothing and heartfelt voice, she made her official debut on June 4th, 2018 through the EP "Period Folding."
